comments.author: TimChaubet-I4U
comments.snippet:
Workaround for the blurriness with mRemoteNG and windows 11: 

- Rightclick mRemoteNG.exe and go to properties
- Compatibility tab
- Change high DPI settings
- Check "Use this setting to fix scaling problems ..." and select in the "Use the DPI that's set for my main display when" to "I signed in to Windows"
- Check "override high DPI scaling behaviour" and set it to system

This way it won't rescale the truetype fonts and your menu & ssh session fonts will no longer be blurry.
